# Mozhi Developer Guide

Mozhi developers environment comes with following options:

* Running everything on local machine
* Running everything on Docker containers and port forwarding to host machine as needed
* Run inside the Kubernetes cluster
* Hybrid combinations


## OS Tools and Frameworks

- [Local Machine](dev_machine.md)  
- [Docker](docker.md)  
- [Kubernetes](kubernetes.md)  
- [MinIO](minio.md)  
- [NVidia](nvidia.md)  

## Data

- [Prepare Data](prepare_data.md)
  
## Code

- [API](api.md)
- [UI](ui.md)
- [OCR](ocr.md)
- Model Training
  - [HuggingFace Model Training](hf_model_training.md)
  - [Pytorch Model Training](pt_model_training.md)
  - [Tensorflow Model Trianing](tf_model_training.md)
